VIII.iv.4.A.6.d
.
Permanence Requirement for SMC Under 38 CFR 3.350(f)(3) and 38 CFR 3.350(f)(4)
Disability evaluations used to support entitlement under
38 CFR 3.350(f)(3)
and
38 CFR 3.350(f)(4)
must be permanent with no future review examination scheduled.
